text_block_list.text:
Finally, the day of the 'Selection Race' came. It's the final one 
of the year, so every Uma Musume is in high spirits.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Yes, I'm fine. 
My body is in perfect condition.

I was a little worried, because it was her first Selection Race. 
But it seems like she's not nervous at all. So she should be fine.

Considering the condition of her leg, we decided to run dirt 
race. She didn't seemed to be worried. She's a really 
reliable Uma Musume.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Fufu… don't worry. I will definitely win. 
I'm going to keep the promise we made.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: But, I will have to refuse that offer.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
I'm happy about the offer, but I'm not capable 
of catching the Sea Breeze of Yae yet. I cannot 
accept the offer in my current state.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
That's why I must race in the upcoming race. 
And become the number one wind.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
If you are able feel my wind on the racecourse, 
Can you be my trainer then?

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
As promised, I'll do my best to show you a race that can 
meet your expectation. So please look forward to it.

She smiled calmly as usual, but something was different 
about her. I stared at her curiously.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
What's wrong, trainer? 
Is there something on my face?

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
I'm feeling a bit embarrassed 
you staring at me like that… fufufu.

I haven't heard a single 'wind' from her today. 
She didn't have that distinctive way of speaking like usual.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Wa. You scared me. Raising your voice like that… 
What's wrong?

…The 'wind' is not coming out of her mouth. Is it possible 
that she is not in her usual state of mind right now?

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Huh? N… No? 
I'm fine. Really…

She didn't look 'fine' to me. It was hard to tell because she 
usually doesn't show her emotions much, but she was worried 
about something for sure.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
I'm really fine. I was able to have a proper training 
all thanks to you…

She's trying to convince me with her words, but I can see her 
body shaking. What is it that's bugging her heart so much?

We were able to prepare for the race in a short amount 
of time. There is nothing to worry about. She can definitely 
handle dirt tracks.

I can think of many words like that to calm her, 
but that's not what she needs to hear right now.

As a trainer who had been watching over Zephyr, 
all I can say to her right now is…

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: …huh?

She must be worried whether or not she could run like the 
'wind' in her current state. The run she always dreamed of.

The 'wind' she wanted to become must have been a 'free' one. 
It must have took many different forms.

Isn't aiming to become only one of the forms 
like fitting the wind into a mold?

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Fitting the wind… 
into a mold…?
choice_data_list: Isn't the wind suppose to be free?
Isn't the wind suppose to be free?

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Yeah… you're right. Exactly… 
Breeze, hurricane, whirlwind, they're all winds.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
The wind doesn't have to stay in one form. 
I should have known this, yet I…

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Thank you, trainer. I realize it now. Yesterday's wind is 
yesterday's wind. Today's me should be like today's wind.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Fufufu… Right now, my heart is an east wind of fall… 
I believe… things are going to get more 'interesting'.
Just like that, Zephyr's first Selection Race started!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Cutting 600m around the third corner, 
Yamanin Zephyr is slightly behind. Will she make it?

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: (It's a breeze so far…)

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Going around the fourth corner we're now entering the 
straights. Yamanin Zephyr is still behind! Can she make a 
comeback from here!?

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: (The harbinger wind stopped blowing… from here!)

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
A fierce battle is happening from the leading group! 
Who's going to make it out!? Oh! From the side! 
Amazing sprint from the outer lane!

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: (Now is the time, to light up the fire in my soul!)

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
It's Yamanin Zephyr! Pushing in from the outside, from third 
to second position aiming to take the lead!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Yamanin Zephyr takes the lead! 
Leading from one horse length to two horse length, GOAL IN!

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Trainer. Did you see my run!
choice_data_list: Yes, it was like a hurricane
Yes, it was like a hurricane

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Fufu, thank you. But, I still have a long way to go. 
The wind has just picked up. It's still just a breeze.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: To become a bigger wind, I want you to―
choice_data_list: Zephyr, I want to be your supporting wind
Zephyr, I want to be your supporting wind

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: …You really are a strange person.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
But… the wind of grace that nurture all things― 
To me, you are that 'Keifu'

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
I would like to propose as well. 
Can you be my personal trainer?

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Very well! 
Please, watch over the path of the wind.
